Monday. Earlier Sunday, Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand told US television that she had visited with Gabrielle Giffords the previous day and found her "doing great" and "making progress every day." Gabrielle Giffords is using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand told NBC's "Meet The Press" program. "It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury," she added. The 40-year-old Gabrielle Giffords
